title: Yu☆Gi☆Oh! (Movie)
synopsis: Blue Eyes White Dragon will bring victory while "Red Eyes Black Dragon will bring the potential of victory". A shy duelist stumbles upon the legendary Red Eyes Black Dragon, with that card in his possession, he must learn to bring out his confidence to duel.
